title: The Asset Allocator: Behind The Idea Reviews “You Can Be A Stock Market Genius,” Part I
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today I introduce you to another Seeking Alpha podcast, called Behind the Idea. My esteemed colleagues Mike Taylor and Daniel Shvartsmann, both super-duper-smart financial wonks, lift the hood of various investing theses every week, with wit and wisdom. This week, they’re doing you the favor of doing your summertime reading for you, reviewing Joel Greenblatt’s “You Can Be A Stock Market Genius.”  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
